name: Crossout: Valentine's day pack
summary: This pack includes: Unique armored vehicle: Prancing pony; Weapons: Autocannon AC43 Rapier and MM5-4 Vector machine gun; Unique cabin: Jockey; Special Wheels: Stallion and Stallion (ST); A unique hero portrait: Bonnie; A unique paint can: Lollipop; A paint can: Aluminium; Increases the maximum number of parts used to 55; Unique sticker:
